title: TPA, Championship, SKT and Fnatic
body: Hey guys just wondering bout ur thoughts. Do u guys think that Riot should make the SKT, TPA, Fnatic and Championship skins available again for a period of time??

replies.body: They all become available again during certain time periods already. Why make them available more often than they are?
Do u know when so i could perhaps get 1??

Typically during events. Or when the new SWG skins are released they'll make the other team skins available.
That's the usual method.
TY so much so ur saying when the Samsung White skins come out i should be able to purchase SKT T1, TPA and Championship skins??
Championship no, they only reappear during the release of the new one.
